title: A nevv treatise of the pestilence, containing the causes, signes, preseruatiues and cure thereof The like not before this time pubished [sic]. And therefore necessarie for all manner of persons, in this time of contagion. S. H. Studious in phisicke.
author: Hobbes, Stephen.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet, for Mathew Law, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Fox in Paules Church-yarde,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
